docs.lead_paragraph: IN the evolution of society perhaps the greatest change that has come about, a change that is as yet scarcely recognized, is in the sin and the sinner who constitutes a menace to society.

headline.main: THE "SMOKELESS SIN" THAT MENACES SOCIETY; Prof. Edward A. Ross Describes the Peculiar Wrongdoing of Modern Times That Is Omitted from Old Definitions of Vice, An Annual Supplement to the Decalogue Needed to Check the Harm Arising from the National Evil of Money-Getting.

docs.snippet: IN the evolution of society perhaps the greatest change that has come about, a change that is as yet scarcely recognized, is in the sin and the sinner who constitutes a menace to society.
